articles.author: Balazs Koranyi, Francesco Canepa
articles.title: Lagarde seized ECB colleagues' handsets to prevent leaks - Reuters.com
articles.description: European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde seized the mobile phones of her fellow policymakers at this week's meeting and rebuked them for leaking crucial information ahead of a policy decision, two sources told Reuters.
articles.content: FRANKFURT/SANTIAGO DE COMPOSTELA, Sept 15 (Reuters) - European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde seized the mobile phones of her fellow policymakers at this week's meeting and rebuked them for… [+3054 chars]
